Clip.Title: MISSION CRITICAL: AMPHIBIAN RESCUE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Follow the race to first find and them rescue the Mountain harlequin frog before the deadly chytrid fungus wipes out the entire species after 200 millions years on Earth.

Clip.Title: AMAZON RIVER CROCS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Cameramen and biologists travel to the heart of Guyana to find and study one of the biggest living reptiles and predators on earth- the black caiman.

Clip.Title: THE BIONIC VET
Clip.EpisodeSummary: No time to rest as The Bionic Vet puts all of his surgical and engineering skills into an operation for puppy Jolly, while battling exhaustion.

Clip.Title: UNDERSEA EDENS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Australia is famously known as "The Great South Land". And it's indeed her southern seas which most define her. The south coast encompasses 5 States and stretches thousands of miles.

Clip.Title: MISSION CRITICAL: AMPHIBIAN RESCUE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Follow the race to first find and them rescue the Mountain harlequin frog before the deadly chytrid fungus wipes out the entire species after 200 millions years on Earth.

Clip.Title: AMAZON RIVER CROCS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Cameramen and biologists travel to the heart of Guyana to find and study one of the biggest living reptiles and predators on earth- the black caiman.

Clip.Title: I HAVE SEEN THE EARTH CHANGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The high-altitude Glaciers that dot this nation are beginning to recede, and the local people are the first to suffer.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From St. John's heading north, the Newfoundland coastline is a maze of iconic bays and inlets - from world-famous Fogo Island, to the abandoned fishing settlements along the island's Northern peninsula.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the remote Northern Shore of Nova Scotia, to the red mud perimetre of Prince Edward Island, the warm waters of the Northumberland Strait are the setting for an incredible aerial exploration of these coastlines.

Clip.EpisodeSummary: Follow the race to first find and them rescue the Mountain harlequin frog before the deadly chytrid fungus wipes out the entire species after 200 millions years on Earth.

Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Zoom above some of America's greatest landcapes and monuments in stunning HD realism.

Clip.Title: TERROR IN THE SKIES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Passengers' footage and cockpit recordings reveal how growing trends in pilot fatigue, stress, and boredom are jeopardizing flight safety.

Clip.Title: SAMURAI HEADHUNTERS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Since the eighth century, the Samurai have held a special place in Japanese history and culture. But over the years, legend has obscured the truth about how these elite knights actually lived, loved, fought, and died. Using rare 16th century war documents, we tell the story of a Samurai coming of age during that time. Witness his rise from peasant boy to foot soldier to ruthless warrior, all brought to life through stunning re-enactments and expert testimony from Japanese and martial arts historians.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An aerial survey of world famous Cape Breton Island reveals why this has been called the "world's greatest road trip" - from the Canso Causeway to the Cape Breton Highlands - the island is a world unto its own.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the remote Northern Shore of Nova Scotia, to the red mud perimetre of Prince Edward Island, the warm waters of the Northumberland Strait are the setting for an incredible aerial exploration of these coastlines.

Clip.Title: U455 - THE MYSTERY OF THE LOST SUBMARINE
Clip.Episode: U455 - The Mystery of the Lost Submarine
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In summer 2008, a mysterious submarine was discovered off the coast of Italy at 120 meters deep. For Lorenzo del Veneziano, an underwater marine archeologist, it was an amazing sight, as the submarine was intact! Could this be the wreck of the long lost U-455, the last missing German U-boat from World War II?

Clip.Title: MENZIES AND CHURCHILL AT WAR
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Follow Robert Menzies to London during the dark months of 1941 as he takes on Winston Churchill, the British Prime Minister, over the strategic direction of the war, as the fate of Australia hangs in the balance

Clip.Title: OPERATION MINCEMEAT
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Based on the best-selling book, Operation Mincemeat reveals the most successful deception of World War II that has been shrouded in secrecy for more than sixty years.

Clip.Title: U455 - THE MYSTERY OF THE LOST SUBMARINE
